channel.title: Librem 5 on Elis Hirwing
channel.description: Recent content in Librem 5 on Elis Hirwing

item.title: First impressions of Purism Librem 5
item.description: Back in 2017, this fairly small company Purism launched a crowdfunding on their own crowdfunding platform for their future phone known as Librem 5. I went back and forth a bit, I thought through some of the history about the company and decided that I thought they may deliver some day. At least I wanted to support the effort to make a modern Linux that could fill the hole that the demise of the Nokia N900 with no worthy device following up.
